function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Changes in data formats and potential api failure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interactive web apps providing access to covid-19 data without coding.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreasing linear daily percent changes in confirmed cases and deaths in china.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of new variants of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of mutation and evolution of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixing measles, mumps, and rubella mmr vaccine to test for broad-spectrum viral immunity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drugs with potential side effects for covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge gaps in understanding covid-19 and its differences from other viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection of workers in slaughterhouses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of live virus in seafood markets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne routes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of virus on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of environmental stability","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elderly population at higher risk of infection and mortality due to degeneration of immunity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Children at risk of severe symptoms due to kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher infection rate in younger population due to insufficient social distancing and mask protection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased thrombotic and micro-vascular complications in severe covid-19 patients, leading to covid-19-associated coagulopathy cac","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invasion of the central nervous system by sars-cov-2, leading to neurological complications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of sars-cov-2 infection mechanism and viral properties.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multi-organ infection and complications caused by sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in t cell apoptosis in covid-19 patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of pathogenic strains through synthetic biology","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of patient zero","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mutations leading to increased infectivity and immune evasion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear research on virus origin","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated water or environment as a source of infection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of vectors and their behavior leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited vector control methods leading to ineffective disease control.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on single vector control tools leading to unsustainable disease control measures.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of funding and weak programmatic capacity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental change, insecticide resistance, and population growth","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historic examples of ’military-like’ vector control lacking community engagement","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration with non-health sectors in vector control","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate development and testing of novel vector control tools","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of insecticide resistance in anopheles and aedes vectors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in vector control approaches to uniform insecticide-based commodities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunding of vector control r&d and programmes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for ntds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global financing shortfalls for malaria control and elimination","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic expansion of vectors and viruses through globalization and urbanization","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparent communication about changing regulations and pandemic impact","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Signalling heritage and cultural identity through food and branding","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Memorializing family members in food business promotion","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact between service providers and customers through personal interactions and shared personal information","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing personal and family information with customers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced hours and restricted services in the dining industry, including food trucks, may have increased congestion and close interactions among customers during peak hours, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for communication may lead to misinformation or incomplete information being shared with customers.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited presence on social media platforms may result in decreased visibility and communication with customers.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interpretation and theory building process may lead to biases or misinterpretations in the proposed framework of service ecosystemic value co-creation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of food trucks at local events increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
